description: Charcoal heather zip-up hoodie with cotton-polyester fleece blend

core:description.text: A comfortable charcoal heather zip-up hoodie crafted from a soft cotton-polyester fleece blend. The matte finish provides a casual, understated look while the full-length zipper allows for easy layering. Features a drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbed cuffs and hem for a snug fit. The heathered texture adds visual interest to this versatile everyday essential.
